Description:
Call of Duty: Ghosts - a new part in the series of Call of Duty. Associates the name of the game with its main characters - an elite unit of ghosts , which then served as Goust , or Lieutenant Simon Riley, an iconic character of the series, treacherously killed Shepard in the second part of the franchise . The game world is close to the post-apocalypse that is new to the series. In the story, due to hacking the space station , "One " , the hacker has launched a major American cities on nuclear missiles . The main characters - two brothers from California who meet with Ghosts and pouring into their team in order to maintain order in a new world .
